entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 16.
